data.comment: The big names in today's match at Reale Arena have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 2, Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Atletico have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 15, Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Atletico.
Stefan Savic (Atletico) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 17, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Goal kick for Atletico at Reale Arena.
Free kick Real Sociedad.
In the minute 22, Mikel Merino (Real Sociedad) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Sebastian.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Atletico.
Throw-in Atletico.
Atletico needs to be cautious. Real Sociedad have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 28, Mikel Merino for Real Sociedad gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Mario Hermoso is booked for the away team.
In the minute 29, Robin Le Normand for Real Sociedad has been booked by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez and receives a first yellow card.
In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Atletico close to the penalty box.
In the minute 32, Real Sociedad drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, In San Sebastian, Portu of Real Sociedad is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Sociedad in San Sebastian.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 37, Can Real Sociedad capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a throw-in for Atletico, close to Real Sociedad's area.
In the minute 39, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Real Sociedad a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Real Sociedad.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Atletico at Reale Arena.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Real Sociedad a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Reale Arena.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Real Sociedad have a dangerous throw-in.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Atletico throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Free kick Atletico.
Goal! A Mario Hermoso header gives Atletico a 0-1 lead in San Sebastian.
In the minute 49, That's a fine assist from Yannick Carrasco.
Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
In the minute 53, Atletico are coming forward and Marcos Llorente gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
In the minute 54, In San Sebastian Atletico drive forward through Yannick Carrasco. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Angel Correa with Saul Niguez.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Real Sociedad close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Atletico at Reale Arena.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 62, Can Real Sociedad capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Sociedad in San Sebastian.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Martin Merquelanz is replacing Ander Barrenetxea for the home team.
Real Sociedad make their second substitution with Alexander Isak replacing Willian Jose.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
In the minute 67, Saul Niguez (Atletico) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Sebastian.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Sebastian.

In San Sebastian a free kick has been awarded the away team.

In the minute 74, Marcos Llorente puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Jon Bautista is on a sub for Portu for Real Sociedad.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Atletico.
Aritz Elustondo is on a sub for Andoni Gorosabel for Real Sociedad.
Roberto Lopez is replacing David Silva for Real Sociedad at Reale Arena.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Atletico needs to be cautious. Real Sociedad have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 80, Free kick Atletico.
Real Sociedad's Aritz Elustondo has been booked in San Sebastian.
Atletico to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
Martin Merquelanz for Real Sociedad drives towards goal at Reale Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In the minute 83, Real Sociedad are pushing forward but Martin Zubimendi's finish is wide of the goal.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Atletico a goal kick.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 85, Atletico's Yannick Carrasco is on target but unsuccessful.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alexander Isak (Real Sociedad) has received a yellow card from Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Real Sociedad have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 87, Diego Simeone is making the team's third substitution at Reale Arena with Renan Lodi replacing Yannick Carrasco.
Diego Costa is replacing Luis Suarez for the away team.
In the minute 88, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Real Sociedad are caught offside.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
In the minute 89, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Real Sociedad.
Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a throw-in for Real Sociedad, close to Atletico's area.
At Reale Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Atletico needs to be cautious. Real Sociedad have an attacking throw-in.
Roberto Lopez (Real Sociedad) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Real Sociedad capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad just outside Atletico's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Sociedad in San Sebastian.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
